# Special Events and Food Trucks - Proposed Zoning Ordinance Amendment

This proposal examines existing standards and review processes for special events and food trucks to identify areas for improvement, increase flexibility, and remove unnecessary impediments and time limits for temporary uses such as special events and food trucks.

## Draft Amendment Text

The draft text for the Special Events and Food Trucks proposed Zoning Ordinance amendment is available for review.

View Draft Text

## 

Community Engagement

## Contact Us

For questions or comments about the proposed amendment, please contact Lily Yegazu, Zoning Administration Division, by email or at 703-324-1314.
